data.eml:eml: A taxonomic revision of frogs of the genus Cryptobatrachus (Anura: Hemiphractidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lynch, John D. (2008): A taxonomic revision of frogs of the genus Cryptobatrachus (Anura: Hemiphractidae). Zootaxa 1883: 28-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.184247
